source.5ecbd46a:
import os
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import cv2
image_size=200
path = "../input/covid-xray-dataset/DATA"
combineddata=[]
count=1
for i in os.listdir(path):
    path2=path +"/"+ i
    for j in os.listdir(path2):
        fie=cv2.imread(path2+"/"+j)
        fie=cv2.resize(fie,(image_size,image_size))
        combineddata.append([fie,i])
        print(count)
        count+=1
source.9623bfda:
X=[]
Y=[]
for i,j in combineddata:
    X.append(i)
    Y.append(int(j))
source.f08065d1:
import numpy as np
X=np.array(X)
Y=np.array(Y)
